import sys

n = int(sys.stdin.readline())
numbers = [int(x) for x in sys.stdin.readline().split()]

sum_of_inverses = 0
for number in numbers:
    sum_of_inverses += 1.0 / number

print(1.0 / sum_of_inverses)

import sys

n = int(sys.stdin.readline())
numbers = [int(x) for x in sys.stdin.readline().split()]

sum_of_inverses = 0.0

    sum_of_inverses += 1 / number

n = int(input())
a = list(map(int, input().split()))

a_sum = 0
for i in range(n):
    a_sum += 1 / a[i]

print(1/a_sum)

    a_sum += 1/a[i]

print(1/a_sum)
#!/usr/bin/env python3

import sys

n = int(sys.stdin.readline())
numbers = [int(x) for x in sys.stdin.readline().split()]

sum_of_inverses = 0.0
for number in numbers:
    sum_of_inverses += 1.0/number

print(1.0/sum_of_inverses)
